newsitem.title: DUBAI: Saudi Arabia beheads man for kidnapping, rape.
newsitem.headline: Saudi Arabia beheads man for kidnapping, rape.

text.p: Saudi Arabia on Tuesday beheaded a Saudi man for kidnapping and raping another man, the Saudi Interior Ministry said.
A ministry statement, carried by official Saudi television, said the man was executed in the city of Taif.
It was the second beheading in two days and raised to 22 the number of people put to death in the conservative Islamic kingdom so far this year.
Another Saudi man was executed on Monday for smuggling hashish into the kingdom.
